titleStmt.title: list of guards of the praetorium
titleStmt.author: unknown

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " List of chiefs of police and guards on the praetorium:;Phasis alias . . . . amela, chief of police;;Psamas, son of Pnepheros, mother Tapeeis;;Poualis, son of Poualis known as the baker,;Nephersais, son of Kollouthos, mother Harpos;;Soummachon, son of Komon;;Didymas, son of Heraklas, mother Tarenas;;Miysis, son of Ischyras, mother Timos, vetch-seller;;Phasis, son of Phasis, mother Heraklous alias Pataba;;Pobres, son of Kolas, alias Tiep;;Ammonis, son of Ischyrion, mother Didyme;;Tieseus, son of Pinas, mother Didis;;Pnepheros, son of Sambathion, alias Arpi.";(Verso): "guards of the metropolis."

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 48, 1969, Pl XIV
